title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 6: Reactive Agility & COD
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Improve first‑step quickness, decel brakes, and reactive decision under chaos.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: Pro‑agility 5‑10‑5 x6; lateral shuffle decel to stick 4x10m
On‑court random feed: 8x (1' on / 1' off) high‑tempo

notes: Week 1: Pre‑planned → reactive. Week 2: shorter cues, higher density.
